item.title: The American Keyboard Layout Is the Best
item.description: My colleagues (Swedish company) occasionally ask me why I use an American US keyboard layout. Most commonly after quickly trying to type something on my computer and it displaying the wrong characters. The answer is simple. It’s better for programming. Editors and programming languages simply feel like they are made with and for the American keyboard layout. The way your fingers have to move to type characters like \ on a Swedish keyboard (you press AltGr and +) is not very intuitive and it feels like an afterthought.
